action.name: Execute Javascript
action.param: "sendData('"& FarmerNumber &"','"& FarmerName &"','"& FarmerDistrict &"','"& FarmerBlock &"','"& FarmerGp &"','"& gameRound &"','"& insuranceCost &"','"& schoolingCost &"','"& loan &"', '"& walletTotal &"','"& landPreCost &"','"& Harvesting &"', '"& uriaFertCost &"', '"& yieldProfit &"', '"& netRevanue &"', '"& cf &"');"
